articles.title: Building of Dam of Paektusan Power Station No. 2 Completed
articles.content:
Building of Dam of Paektusan Power Station No. 2 Completed
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- The builders of the Paektusan Songun Youth Power Station completed the building of a dam and a surge tank of Power Station No. 2 in a matter of a little over one year since the inauguration of Power Station No. 1.
					 This opened a clear prospect for bringing the day of the completion of the power station. 
					
					 The organization and command over the operation have been scrupulously made.
					
					 The builders carried out their daily quotas at 140 percent on an average, at more than 200 per cent at maximum by increasing the operation rate of vehicles and boldly applying rational methods of construction.
					
					 They finished the building of an overflow dam in a matter of 40 odd days despite unfavorable conditions during the rainy season.
					
					 The builders in charge of the construction of the surge tank gave precedence to the expansion of the waterway tunnel and pushed ahead with the work to cover it with concrete.
					
					 They hastened the construction of the surge tank while saving a lot of manpower and materials by applying dozens of technological innovation and invention proposals.
					
					 With the construction of the dam and surge tank completed, the power station looks more magnificent.
					
					 The members of the Paektusan Songun youth shock brigade are waging a vigorous drive to greet the 65th anniversary of the DPRK with greater labor success in the same spirit as displayed in the building of the dam and the surge tank.

articles.title: Study Tour of Oun Revolutionary Site Made
articles.content:
Study Tour of Oun Revolutionary Site Made
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Young people in Pyongyang made the study tour of the Oun Revolutionary Site Friday to mark the Youth Day.
					 The site is a meaningful place where leader Kim Jong Il took part in the military camping exercise from August 20 to October 4, Juche 51 (1962).
					
					 They offered a floral basket to the statue of the Generalissimo Kim Il Sung on Ryongnam Hill and paid tribute to them.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony for declaring the start of the tour they left for Oun-dong.
					
					 They marched along the road, singing in chorus "Footsteps", "Song of Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League" and "We Will Defend General Kim Jong Un at the Cost of Our Lives" and other songs that were blared from the loudspeaker van.
					
					 At the destination they looked round data and buildings that are preserved as relics before holding a rally to make a pledge before the Monument to Revolutionary Activities of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Led by the call of Chairman of the Pyongyang City Committee of the Youth League Ri Kun Chol, all the participants hardened their pledge to advance straight along the road to the victory of the Songun revolution under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un and make contribution to building a prospering country of Juche on this land.
					
					 They also held an oratorical meeting and enjoyed an art performance given by students of Kim Il Sung University.

articles.title: Sports Enthusiasm Runs Higher in DPRK
articles.content:
Sports Enthusiasm Runs Higher in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Sports enthusiasm is running higher among the people of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The sultry days are going on, but the park is bustling with people, said Ri Man Gil, head of the Management Office of the Rungna People's Sports Park. 
					
					 Encouraged by the successes gained by DPRK athletes in various international tournaments, an increasing number of people are getting interested in sports activities.
					
					 Some days ago, a swimming contest was held at the swimming pool of the Changgwang Health Complex, attended by officials of the commissions, ministries and national institutions with five men and one woman from each team. 
					
					 Sports matches covering different events took place among employees at units on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War (July 27) and the anniversary of Korea's liberation from the Japanese colonial rule (August 15).
					
					 Sports activities have gained momentum with the approach of the Youth Day (August 28).
					
					 Sports matches held in a vigorous way have given impetus to developing sports techniques among the local people.
					
					 Sports parks built in cities of the country are crowded with people on holidays.
					
					 Conspicuous are volleyball games held at neighborhood units involving even housewives.
					
					 The ever-growing sports enthusiasm has led the people to enjoy an optimistic life at all times.

articles.title: DPRK Directs Efforts to Developing Economy
articles.content:
DPRK Directs Efforts to Developing Economy
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un, in the 2013 New Year Address, set the building of a strong economy as a key issue in accomplishing the cause of building a thriving socialist nation. 
					 In response to his New Year Address, the people in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have made fresh upsurge in all economic sectors in the spirit of the "Masikryong Speed". 
					
					 Readjustment of the West Sea Barrage-Sinchon-Kangryong and Ongjin waterways was finished in ten days, while more than 1,000 hectares of fruit field has come into being in Pukchong County, South Hamgyong Province. 
					
					 The Pyongyang Essential Foodstuff Factory and the Phyongsong Synthetic Leather Factory have become streamlined and the Vitamin C Factory and the Turf Research Center of the State Academy of Science were newly built on a modern basis. 
					
					 Lots of industrial establishments across the country finished the first half-yearly assignments ahead of schedule.
					
					 The country's science witnessed big achievements during the first half of the year.
					
					 The 10th national sci-tech presentation and show in the field of nano-technology and national sci-tech presentation in the field of mining industry took place, and an IT presentation was held on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the Central Agency for Information of Science and Technology.
					
					 More than 140,000 hectares of land were afforested, 590 kilometers of roads repaired and 2,100 kilometers of riversides improved.
					
					 The Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum was newly built in a wonderful way on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War (June 1950-July 1953).
					
					 The Rungna People's Sports Park and Pyongyang International Football School were also built in Pyongyang.
					
					 A wave of innovations have been registered in building the Masik Pass Ski Resort, the reclamation project of the Sepho Tableland, the expansion project of the Kosan Fruit Farm and the construction of the second-stage Huichon Power Station. 
					
					 The same is true with the construction sites of apartment houses for scientists, children's hospital, dental hospital, Munsu Wading Pool and Mirim Riding Club. 
					
					 All these projects are carried on as part of the efforts for implementing the plan of Kim Jong Un on turning the country into an economic giant.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Replacing Armistice by Lasting Peace
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Replacing Armistice by Lasting Peace
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- It is the consistent stand of the DPRK to promote peace and security in Northeast Asia including the Korean Peninsula and other parts in the world, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 A new war didn't break out and peace has been preserved on the peninsula under so tense situation entirely thanks to the DPRK, which has consistently pursued a peace-loving policy.
					
					 The Korean people love peace more than any others and the DPRK is a peace-loving state which regards it as the main tenet of its foreign policy to preserve peace. Its socialist policy is peace-loving in its nature. The building of a thriving socialist nation stepped up by the Korean people requires a peaceful environment.
					
					 The DPRK has made consistent efforts to turn the armistice on the peninsula into lasting peace. However, it failed to settle on the peninsula despite the DPRK's sincere efforts.
					
					 This is attributable to the dishonest attitude of Washington toward the just and aboveboard proposal of the DPRK.
					
					 Entering the new century Washington turned its face away from the DPRK's proposal calling on the countries concerned with the Armistice Agreement (AA) to push ahead with the issue of declaring the termination of war and its offer to start talks for replacing the AA with a peace treaty as soon as possible in the year marking the 60th anniversary of the outbreak of the Korean war, etc. The former took such persistent stand of turning down all the peace proposals and initiatives of the latter because the former lacked the will to turn truce into lasting peace.
					
					 Had the U.S. accepted any of those proposals of the DPRK, lasting peace would have already settled on the peninsula.
					
					 Stronger will be the stand and will of the DPRK to preserve stability and peace on the Korean Peninsula and contribute to defending world peace.

articles.title: Japanese Politicians' Visit to Yasukuni Shrine Blasted
articles.content:
Japanese Politicians' Visit to Yasukuni Shrine Blasted
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Ultra-right politicians of Japan paid a group visit to Yasukuni Shrine on Thursday, the anniversary of its defeat. 
					 The minister of General Affairs, the chairman of the State Security Committee and the minister of Administrative Reform who are cabinet ministers visited the shrine in the wake of the chief executive's donation of ornamental offering to it on the day. 
					
					 102 dietmen belonging to "the Dietmen's League for Everybody's Visit to Yasukuni Shrine" thronged to the shrine to incite militarism.  
					
					 This reckless action clearly indicates how desperately Japan is working to revive militarism for launching reinvasion.

articles.title: Projected Ulji Freedom Guardian Condemned in S. Korea
articles.content:
Projected Ulji Freedom Guardian Condemned in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Organizations for the reunification movement in south Korea held a rally in Seoul on August 13 denouncing the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces for mulling staging joint military exercises.
					 At the rally speakers recalled that the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises will start on August 19, the largest-ever war exercises with hundreds of thousands of troops including U.S. forces involved.
					
					 The warmongers will stage drills for making a preemptive strike on the north with various type latest nuclear offensive means involved, they said, adding it is sheer sophism to describe the saber-rattling as defensive one.
					
					 These military exercises will further escalate the crisis on the Korean Peninsula, they charged.
					
					 In order to defuse the danger of war it is important to conclude a peace treaty, they said, calling for waging a dynamic struggle to put an end to the present regime's policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen and preserve the June 15 spirit.
					
					 The participants in the rally called for concluding a peace treaty to remove the danger of war and putting an end to the confrontation policy of the present "government" and preserve the spirit of June 15 joint declaration by dynamic struggle.

articles.title: S. Korean Media Slammed for Shutting Eyes to Injustice
articles.content:
S. Korean Media Slammed for Shutting Eyes to Injustice
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- An article was posted on the south Korean internet paper Saram Ilbo on August 9 to accuse media of turning their faces away from the campaign of people from all social standings for publishing declarations on the situation in demand of the probe into the truth about the Intelligence Service's illegal acts.
					 Media persons published a declaration on the situation in protest against the IS's interference in the election in Seoul on August 8 but most of the media did not report about this, the article noted.
					
					 People of different social standings continue to issue declarations on the situation in various parts of south Korea denouncing the IS's illegal acts and protesting against the present regime's obstructions to the probe into the truth about the case, but media are shutting their eyes to this, the article said, adding this proves that the media are little different from those in the "yusin" period.
					
					 It is a serious social crime to keep mum about the issue being branded as an illegal act and a coup violating democracy, it charged.
					
					 There is no need to keep any longer media shutting their eyes to injustice, it warned.

articles.title: Students Will Take Lead in Paving Way for Reunification: S. Korean Organization
articles.content:
Students Will Take Lead in Paving Way for Reunification: S. Korean Organization
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Students Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration held a press conference in Seoul on August 13 at which it called upon the  youth and students of the north and the south and abroad to bring earlier the reunification and co-prosperity of the nation.
					 At the press conference speakers said that the youth and students aspiring after peace and reunification of the nation can never allow  acts of denying the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 They proposed called on youth and students of the south and the north and overseas to jointly hold a rally for realizing exchange in sports and academic field and denouncing Japan's moves for reviving militarism.
					
					 They declared the youth and students would take the lead in paving the way for reunification, looking back on the 68-year history of division.
					
					 They urged the authorities to positively ensure that the proposal for national reconciliation and cooperation is put into practice.

articles.title: Int'l Solidarity for Reparation from Japan for Past Crimes Called for
articles.content:
Int'l Solidarity for Reparation from Japan for Past Crimes Called for
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- A seminar took place in Seoul on August 13 to wrest reparation from Japan for the crimes related to sexual slavery committed by the Japanese imperialists. It was sponsored by the Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea.
					 Present there were victims to sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, representatives of international organizations, lawyers of Japan and other foreign guests.
					
					 Speakers denounced the Japanese government for ignoring the recommendation of the international community on making apology and reparation for the above-said crimes.
					
					 They called for putting pressure on Japan through international solidarity of activists for human rights and peace.
					
					 They called for further strengthening solidarity with human rights organizations against violence on women in different parts of the world and with victims to sexual slavery.
					
					 They stressed the need to properly liquidate the history through those activities.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Accused of Concealing Truth about IS's Case
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Accused of Concealing Truth about IS's Case
Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Students of nine universities including Toksong Women's University, Pusan University and Seoul National University in south Korea held a rally in Seoul on August 13 at which they accused the puppet regime and the ruling party of working hard to cover up the truth about the case of the interference of the Intelligence Service (IS) in the election.
					 Speakers at the rally censured the former director of the IS and the former chief of the Seoul Metropolitan Police Agency, who are chiefly responsible for the above-said case, for asserting they cannot be present at a hearing for the state investigation for their health reasons and due to timing for trial.
					
					 This is not an attitude of admitting their wrongs concerning the case and repenting of them, they charged.
					
					 They blasted the "Saenuri Party" for shielding those involved in the illegal acts, far from punishing them or making a counter-proposal.
					
					 They said that the people are more bitterly angered by the government's attitude to conceal the crimes and cover them up, far from paying heed to their resentment at the case.
					
					 They held the "government" and the "Saenuri Party" responsible for using the IS for their political purpose.
					
					 At the end of the rally the participants marched toward the hall of the "National Assembly".

articles.title: Improvement of Inter-Korean Relations Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Improvement of Inter-Korean Relations Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- The Committee for Promoting the August 15 Meeting for Independent Reunification on the 68th Anniversary of the Country's Liberation in south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on August 13 at which it demanded the present regime opt for improving the inter-Korean relations and realizing peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					 The floor was taken by Han Chung Mok, co-representative of the Solidarity for Progress, Ri Kwang Sok, chairman of the Federation of Peasants Associations, and others.
					
					 Speakers said tensions have not yet been defused on the Korean Peninsula due to the ceaseless war maneuvers of the U.S. and south Korean authorities.
					
					 Peace cannot be realized with the Armistice Agreement, they said, urging the U.S. to stop the hostile aggressive war maneuvers and opt for the negotiations for concluding a peace treaty at once.
					
					 They also urged the south Korean regime to stop the military hostile policy and do its best to create circumstances for starting negotiations on peace.
					
					 They noted that people aspiring after reunification will get united to fight against the anti-reunification policy of the regime.
					
					 They stressed they would kindle a torch for peace and reunification through the current August 15 meeting.

articles.title: Rally Held in S. Korea in Protest against IS
articles.content:
Rally Held in S. Korea in Protest against IS
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA)-- The south Korean Council on Emergency Situation for Condemning the Emergency Situation Council to Denounce Intelligence Service's Interference in Presidential Election for Political Operation held a rally at Seoul Square on Wednesday in protest against  the IS, according to KBS of south Korea. 
					 It was attended by at least 40,000 people of different social standings.
					
					 Speakers at the rally held that a thorough investigation should be conducted into the IS's illegal interference in the last "presidential" election.
					
					 They demanded the "government" authorities totally reform the IS as it is engrossed in illegal acts.

articles.title: Meeting in Russia Observes Anniversary of Korea's Liberation
articles.content:
Meeting in Russia Observes Anniversary of Korea's Liberation
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Moscow under the sponsorship of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK on August 13 to mark the 68th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 On display in the venue were famous works of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and books introducing the undying exploits of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Speeches were made by Victor Petrov, chairman of the association, S. M. Kramarenko, chairperson of the Korean War Veterans' Council of Russia, and others.
					
					 The speakers said the day of Korea's liberation is of great significance in the Korean history.
					
					 Kim Il Sung waged a protracted armed struggle, beating back the Japanese imperialists and liberating the country, they noted, adding the Korean people could achieve a brilliant victory thanks to him.
					
					 The DPRK established the most progressive socio-political system under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il after the liberation and is now demonstrating its dignity as a military power which no aggressor dares provoke, they stressed.
					
					 They expressed belief that the historic tradition of friendship between the two peoples would steadily grow stronger.
					
					 They hoped that the Korean people would register bigger successes in their efforts to achieve the reunification of the country and accomplish the cause of socialism under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, successor to the cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A message of greeting to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Nepalese Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Nepalese Paper
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" was carried by the Nepalese paper Charcha on August 12.
					 The work, made public on August 4, Juche 86 (1997), clarifies immortal exploits President Kim Il Sung performed in the cause of national reunification.
					
					 It formulates the three principles of national reunification, the ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as the three charters for national reunification and indicates the tasks to be fulfilled to accomplish the cause of national reunification on the basis of them.
					
					 The paper carried a photo of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed in Serbia
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed in Serbia
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- The general secretary of the New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia issued a statement on August 9 to mark the 16th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification".
					 The work, published on August 4, Juche 86 (1997), formulates the three principles of national reunification, the 10-point programme for the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo (DFRK) as the three charters for national reunification. It also indicates tasks and ways to achieve the cause of national reunification on the basis of them.
					
					 Noting the work is a great programme which brought great hope into the Korean people struggling to reunify the country and the world progressive people supporting Korea's reunification, the statement said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung dedicated his all to the country's reunification till the last moments of his life and Kim Jong Il successfully carried forward his cause of national reunification.
					
					 If reunification is to be achieved on the Korean Peninsula, it is necessary to conclude a peace treaty between the DPRK and the U.S. and make foreign forces withdraw from south Korea to the last man.
					
					 No matter how desperately the U.S. and south Korea work, can they never quell the desire of the Korean people to achieve reconciliation and unity in the idea of "By our nation itself" and found the DFRK, true to the great programme for reunification.
					
					 I am sure that the Korean people will certainly achieve national reunification in the near future under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: 65th Anniversary of DPRK to Be Celebrated in Switzerland
articles.content:
65th Anniversary of DPRK to Be Celebrated in Switzerland
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- A Swiss preparatory committee for celebrating the 65th anniversary of the DPRK was inaugurated in Basel on August 9.
					 A statement was adopted at the inaugural ceremony.
					
					 The statement noted the Korean people could greet the happiest event in their history spanning 5,000 years as President Kim Il Sung founded the DPRK.
					
					 The preparatory committee set the celebration period from August 15 to September 10 and decided to post famous works of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un on websites and hold diverse events including film show and meeting in that period.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits for Nation-building Lauded by Swiss Organization
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits for Nation-building Lauded by Swiss Organization
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Preparatory Committee for Celebrating the 65th Anniversary of the DPRK issued a statement at its inaugural ceremony on August 9.
					 The statement said:
					
					 As President Kim Il Sung founded the DPRK, the Korean people could greet the happiest event in their history spanning 5,000 years.
					
					 The young DPRK won a shining victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War fought against the U.S. imperialist aggressors under the leadership of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, an invincible and iron-willed commander.
					
					 The Korean people and army achieved a historic victory in the war, beating back the U.S. imperialists' criminal and barbarous invasion aimed to swallow up the DPRK and protecting the independence and sovereignty of the country. 
					
					 By successfully applying the idea of Korean-style socialist construction for decades, Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il turned the DPRK into a country which is free from taxes and where the systems of free education and free medical care are in force and all the people are provided with jobs and houses. 
					
					 The DPRK has developed into an independent, self-supporting and modern socialist state centered on the popular masses, guided by the great Juche idea and Songun idea.
					
					 Thanks to the Songun politics enforced by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the DPRK has turned into an invulnerable bulwark, an invincible fortress of socialism capable of beating back any formidable enemy.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea and the government of the DPRK have made vigorous endeavors to achieve the reunification of the country under the outstanding leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the party, state and army, is energetically leading the struggle for building a thriving socialist nation and achieving the reunification of the country, true to the behests of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Presidente guineo se reune con delegacion gubernamental de la RPDC
articles.content:
Presidente guineo se reune con delegacion gubernamental de la RPDC
Pyongyang, 16 de agosto (ACNC) -- El presidente de la Republica de Guinea, Alpha Conde, se reunio el dia 14 en el Palacio Presidencial con la delegacion gubernamental de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea encabezada por el canciller Pak Ui Chun, de visita en ese pais africano.
					En la ocasion, el mandatario recordo que los lideres antecesores de Corea y Su Excelencia Mariscal Kim Jong Un enviaron el desinteresado apoyo y cooperacion para el desarrollo socioeconomico de Guinea.
					
					Expuso la voluntad de desarrollar las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises que tienen larga historia.
					
					Manifesto la solidaridad con el pueblo coreano que lucha por la reunificacion pacifica del pais.

articles.title: Conversaciones entre cancilleres de Corea y Guinea
articles.content:
Conversaciones entre cancilleres de Corea y Guinea
Pyongyang, 16 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 14 en Conakry las conversaciones entre el canciller coreano Pak Ui Chun y el ministro de Estado encargado de Relaciones Exteriores y Compatriotas en Ultramar de Guinea, Francois Lonseny.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes por la parte coreana los miembros de la delegacion gubernamental de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, de visita en la Republica de Guinea y el embajador coreano en ese pais africano y por la guinea, el ministro de Agricultura, el secretario general del Ministerio de Defensa Nacional, el director general encargado de Africa, Asia y Medio Oriente del Ministerio de Estado encargado de Relaciones Exteriores y Compatriotas en Ultramar y otros interesados.
					
					Ambas partes informaron de la situacion de sus respectivos paises e intercambiaron el criterio sobre el desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad y otros asuntos de interes mutuo.

articles.title: Paz es invariable ideal de politica exterior de la RPDC, destaca Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Paz es invariable ideal de politica exterior de la RPDC, destaca Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 16 de agosto (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual difundido este viernes, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea tiene la invariable posicion de promover la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y del Nordeste Asiatico y ademas, la paz y la seguridad del mundo entero, y continua:
					A pesar de la situacion muy tensa de la Peninsula Coreana, se mantiene la paz gracias a la RPDC que practica en todo tiempo la politica pacifista.
					
					El pueblo coreano aprecia la paz mas que nadie y la RPDC es el Estado pacifista que la toma como el ideal principal de su politica exterior.
					
					La politica socialista de la RPDC es, en su esencia, la aspirante a la paz y la construccion de Estado prospero socialista por el pueblo coreano demanda el ambiente pacifico.
					
					La RPDC vino esforzandose constantemente por cambiar el estado de armisticio de la Peninsula Coreana por el de paz duradera. Pero, a pesar de los sinceros esfuerzos de la RPDC, no ha garantizado todavia en esta Peninsula la paz duradera debido a la insincera actitud de EE.UU. sobre las iniciativas imparciales y justas de la primera.
					
					En el nuevo siglo, EE.UU. nego la propuesta coreana de promover el debate de los paises interesados del Acuerdo de Armisticio para declarar el fin de guerra y la de iniciar lo mas pronto posible en este ano del 60o aniversario del estallido de la guerra coreana, las conversaciones para sustituir el Acuerdo de Armisticio por el convenio de paz.
					
					La negativa parte de la falta de voluntad de cambiar el estado de armisticio por paz duradera.
					
					Si EE.UU. hubiera aceptado alguna de las propuestas justas de la RPDC, habria llegado ya la paz duradera a la Peninsula Coreana.  
					
					En lo adelante, seran mas firmes la posicion y voluntad de la RPDC de defender hasta el final la estabilidad y paz de la Peninsula Coreana y contribuir a la defensa de paz mundial.

articles.title: Abramos nueva coyuntura de reconciliacion, cooperacion, paz y prosperidad, senala ACNC
articles.content:
Abramos nueva coyuntura de reconciliacion, cooperacion, paz y prosperidad, senala ACNC
Pyongyang, 16 de agosto (ACNC) -- El dia 14, en la Zona Industrial de Kaesong (ZIK) tuvo lugar la 7a ronda de conversaciones de trabajo entre las autoridades del Norte y el Sur de Corea para normalizar la operacion de la ZIK acaparando la atencion de todos los coreanos.
					En la ocasion quedo aprobado el acuerdo sobre la normalizacion de la ZIK que complacio con motivo del 68o aniversario de la liberacion de Corea a todos los coreanos que desean la mejora de las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas.
					
					La aprobacion del acuerdo es el noble fruto de la aspiracion y la voluntad unanime de todo el pueblo coreano de salvar de la crisis el destino de la ZIK, preciosa riqueza comun de la nacion, y de abrir nueva brecha en el desarrollo de las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					Los articulos del acuerdo hacen conocer los esfuerzos y la posicion magnanimos de la RPDC de alcanzar a la meta general, o sea, la normalizacion progresiva de la ZIK, disminuyendo a toda costa las diferencias de criterios de ambas partes coreanas, y la sabiduria y la inteligencia de la nacion coreana.
					
					Demuestran tambien el reconocimiento profundo sobre el dolor y los danos que sufren las empresas surcoreanas a causa de paro de la ZIK y sus influencias en las relaciones intercoreanas, la esperanza y el anhelo del interior y exterior del pais que desean la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y la region.
					
					Todo el proceso de aprobacion del acuerdo enseno la leccion de que cuando se de prioridad a la demanda e interes comunes de la nacion, no hay nada insoluble ni insuperable.
					
					Para la nacion coreana que cumple el 68o aniversario de la liberacion de la patria, la adopcion del acuerdo resulto mas significativa.
					
					En este momento, se abrio la perspectiva de salvar la ZIK, simbolo de la reconciliacion, la cooperacion y la reunificacion nacionales, al aliviar aunque sea en lo minimo los factores de confrontacion y desconfianza producidos por la division nacional con la inteligencia y los esfuerzos comunes de ambas partes coreanas.
					
					La division fue creada por las fuerzas foraneas, pero eliminar esta tragedia es la causa comun a ser cumplida con las fuerzas unidas de la nacion coreana.
					
					El acuerdo resulta mas significativo al considerar que inscribio en lo profundo de corazon de toda la nacion coreana la confianza de que se puede abrir sin falta la nueva fase de la reconciliacion, la cooperacion, la paz, la reunificacion y la prosperidad cuando ambas partes coreanas se entiendan y busquen puntos comunes dejando atras las diferencias existentes.
					
					Gracias a la aprobacion del acuerdo, se demostro al interior y exterior del pais la voluntad y los esfuerzos comunes de la nacion coreana por contribuir activamente a la paz de la region y el resto del mundo y al desarrollo estable al cumplir satisfactoriamente la mision y el papel de autor de la realizacion de la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					El resultado de las presentes conversaciones intercoreanas demuestra que quien debe resolver el problema de relaciones intercoreanas es precisamente la nacion coreana.
					
					Ambas partes coreanas deberan tomar las medidas activas para consolidar los exitos de las presentes conversaciones y ampliar y desarrollar mas las labores para la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion y la reunificacion y la prosperidad bajo la bandera "Entre nosotros, los connacionales".
					
					El ambiente pacifico de la Peninsula Coreana, premisa del desarrollo de relaciones N-S, sera preparado por los esfuerzos comunes de la nacion coreana.
					
					El Norte y el Sur deberan hacer frente comun a cualquier acto que fomente la confrontacion fratricida y agrave la tension de la Peninsula Coreana en contrasentido a la aspiracion y la demanda de la nacion.
					
					Es inconmovible la posicion y la voluntad del gobierno y el pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de defender la demanda y el interes comunes de la nacion.
					
					En el futuro tambien, la RPDC cumplira plenamente su mision y papel en la lucha por la reconciliacion, la unidad, la reunificacion y la prosperidad de la nacion.
